column4: question - is it possible to add the medibuntu repositories directly to the apt source list?
you can add any source to the source list as long as you have the correct address
obviously :) I was just wondering why there were these convoluted instructions under "Adding Repositories" here: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Medibuntu
rather than just adding one or two source lines to the /etc/apt/sources.list
